channel.title: c.dialogueAction and ClickingButtons.java help

item.title: c.dialogueAction and ClickingButtons.java help
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

I know i’m going to feel stupid when I learn what I did wrong.

So I have Dialogue that eventually sends you to sendOption2 and Yes and No. c.dialogueAction = 69; and the ActionButtonIDs are 9157 and 9158. In ClickingButtons.java I have under case 9517: and case 9518: if (c.dialogueAction == 69) { } And it dosen’t seem to me calling my c.getDH().sendOption5("","","","",""); and it still dosen’t work.

Read full topic
